name: Risu's Nonstop Nut Navigation
description:
Sort Nuts in this pong-like game!
Can you sort 30 nuts? What about nonstop nuts?
(Difficulty increases at 3,9,18, and 30 nuts)

Credits:
Made using Godot, Figma, Audacity and Krita
Free BGM "猫がうろちょろ" by alaki paca
SFX and Inspiration from Ayunda Risu ch.
